price: 72 Est-ce vous ou bien Nous qui avons créé le bois d’où il jaillit ?
arabic: ءَأَنتُمۡ أَنشَأۡتُمۡ شَجَرَتَهَآ أَمۡ نَحۡنُ ٱلۡمُنشِـُٔونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: a-antum anshatum shajaratahā am naḥnu al-munshiūna
